DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare the CACS obtained from standard dose CT to the CACS obtained from ultra-low-dose scans. Additionally, the usefulness of ultra-low-dose CT for AC of myocardial perfusion SPECT will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Ultra Low Dose CT for CACS and AC of SPECT
DOC.criteria: Patients referred for myocardial perfusion SPECT Male and Female subjects â‰¥18 years of age, Written informed consent Pregnancy or breastfeeding CACS of 0 after inclusion of 10 patients with CACS 0 Stents or implanted cardiac devices (valves, pace makers, ICD) Coronary artery bypass grafts
